TopicTitle: Horten Ho-229 [flying wing] [Low part count, high speed, super maneuverable, super stable]

Articles.Content:
She pulls over 20 G's, carries a lot of fuel, cruises near supersonic at sea level with two engines, and is super stable. This is an awesome jet all around, and I have to thank the Horton Brothers.

![whyIgVt.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/whyIgVt.jpg)

The craft:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/zxc2ujbd8xgzde0/Ho-229.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zxc2ujbd8xgzde0/Ho-229.craft?dl=0)

Very nice replica. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I've experimented with flying wing designs myself but mainly for SSTO's.
Nice. Flying wings are a pain, but quite cool.

Just like the real thing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Now put it up against the XB wing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Aw come on I just made a axis aircraft pack and was getting ready to upload it when I saw this. I guess that'll be delayed.

Screenshot from WT! Eeeeewwwwwww!

Nice craft. Been trying to build one of those myself.

Lets go comrade. I made this a long... time ago but I never released it... but hey my post wouldn't have gotten as much recognition in comparison to the more prominent forum users. Here you go. It was my version and yes flying it was a pain but eventually I found yaw control. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
